content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (52.5, 51.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 52.5, 51.5), boiler (position not specified), and offshore pump (position not specified). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has warnings indicating it has no input liquid and no fluid present in connections.

### Copper plate mine at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 1.0, 1.0) and a furnace (position 1.0, 1.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 10.0, 1.0) and a furnace (position 10.0, 1.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter (position not specified) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position 1.0, 1.0 to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting coal into steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine has available space and is configured to accept coal before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when placing small electric poles
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the small electric pole, as the maximum placement distance is limited.

### Errors related to power connection
- Verify that the steam engine is properly connected to a power network and has the necessary input liquid to operate.

### NameError in code execution
- Ensure that all required libraries and modules are properly imported and defined in the script to avoid NameErrors.
